metadata.title: CVE-2015-6637 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The MediaTek misc-sd driver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY49F and 6.0 before2016-01-01 allows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application,aka internal bug 25307013.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
